dcterms:creator: S. Li
D. Yi
Z. Lei
S. Liao
dcterms:description: The CASIA NIR-VIS 2.0 Face Database contains a total of 725 identities, with each identity having 1-22 VIS and 5-50 NIR images. It is used for evaluating heterogeneous face recognition performance.
dcterms:title: CASIA NIR-VIS 2.0 Face Database

dcterms:creator: D. Huang
J. Sun
Y. Wang
dcterms:description: The BUAA-VisNir Face Database consists of 150 identities, each with multiple NIR and VIS images, used for evaluating domain adaptation in heterogeneous face recognition.
dcterms:title: BUAA-VisNir Face Database

dcterms:creator: H. S. Bhatt
S. Bharadwaj
R. Singh
M. Vatsa
dcterms:description: The IIIT-D Sketch Viewed Database is developed for Sketch-Photo recognition and contains 238 image pairs, used for evaluating sketch recognition performance.
dcterms:title: IIIT-D Sketch Viewed Database

dcterms:creator: K. Panetta
Q. Wan
S. Agaian
S. Rajeev
S. Kamath
R. Rajendran
S. Rao
A. Kaszowska
H. Taylor
A. Samani
Y. Xin
dcterms:description: The Tufts Face Database is collected for the study of imaging systems and provides Thermal-VIS face images for evaluating heterogeneous face recognition.
dcterms:title: Tufts Face Database

dcterms:creator: Y. Guo
L. Zhang
Y. Hu
X. He
J. Gao
dcterms:description: MS-Celeb-1M is a large-scale dataset and benchmark for face recognition, containing millions of images of celebrities.
dcterms:title: MS-Celeb-1M

dcterms:creator: J. Chen
D. Yi
J. Yang
G. Zhao
S. Z. Li
M. Pietikainen
dcterms:description: The Oulu-CASIA NIR-VIS Database is used for learning mappings for face synthesis from near infrared to visual light images.
dcterms:title: Oulu-CASIA NIR-VIS Database

dcterms:creator: R. Gross
I. Matthews
J. Cohn
T. Kanade
S. Baker
dcterms:description: The Multi-PIE Database is often employed for multi-pose evaluations and contains images of faces under various poses and expressions.
dcterms:title: Multi-PIE Database

dcterms:creator: Z. Deng
X. Peng
Y. Qiao
dcterms:description: The NJU-ID Database is built to study ID-Camera face verification, containing ID card images and camera images.
dcterms:title: NJU-ID Database
